title: LineageOS 19 builds arrive for Samsung Galaxy S10 series, Essential Phone, plus more
content:
LineageOS 19 based upon Android 12 may have only officially launched just a few weeks ago, but it is already expanding to more devices, including the Samsung Galaxy S10, Essential Phone, Poco F2 Pro, Poco F3, plus many more.

moreâ€¦

The post LineageOS 19 builds arrive for Samsung Galaxy S10 series, Essential Phone, plus more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: LineageOS 19 based upon Android 12 builds are now available for the Samsung Galaxy S10 series, Essential Phone, Poco F2, F3, plus more.
